TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1271
TEI.2.document_title: Green De Witt to Stephen F. Austin, 03-09-1826

barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1271

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Introducing immigrants.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*New London Ralls County Mo*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="03-09-1826">March 9th 1826*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear Sir*/p*
*p*Permit me to Introduce to your attention *person_mentioned*Col Elijah Stapp*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Mr William Duncan*/person_mentioned*; who come to *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned* for the purpose of selecting *location_mentioned*lands */location_mentioned*for a number of *person_mentioned*families*/person_mentioned*; who intend to megrate from this *location_mentioned*County*/location_mentioned* to that *location_mentioned*Country*/location_mentioned*, they are particularly bound for the *location_mentioned*Guadalupe*/location_mentioned* or *location_mentioned*San Marco*/location_mentioned*, as their intention is *location_mentioned*Mills */location_mentioned**location_mentioned*Cotton Gins*/location_mentioned* etc—*/p*
*p*I did not pass by the way of *location_mentioned*Mine a Burton*/location_mentioned* on my return home— but I sent your letters to *person_mentioned*Mr E Bates*/person_mentioned*, by your *person_mentioned*Cousin */person_mentioned*(*person_mentioned*Mr Austin*/person_mentioned*) he also told me that *person_mentioned*Mrs Perry*/person_mentioned* and the rest of your *person_mentioned*friends */person_mentioned*in *location_mentioned*Mo*/location_mentioned*. were well—*/p*
*p*Any favors you render the above Gentlemen will be gratefully remembered and acknowledged—*/p*
*p*I shall leave *location_mentioned*Missouri*/location_mentioned* the *date_mentioned n="04-01-1826">first of next Month*/date_mentioned* with my *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*for *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*.—for the news of the day I refur you to *person_mentioned*Col Stapp*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*G. Dewitt*/person_mentioned*.*/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col Stephen F Austin*/person_mentioned**/p* */div1*
